tool_description: Retrieves current zoning codes, regulations, and ordinances for a specified jurisdiction, including allowed uses, restrictions, and requirements.

jurisdiction_name.description: Name of the city, county, or municipality

zoning_district.description: Specific zoning district code (e.g., R1, C2, M1)

error_messages: Jurisdiction not found: Verify the jurisdiction name spelling and ensure it exists in the database.
Zoning district invalid: The specified zoning district does not exist in this jurisdiction.
Access denied: Current user lacks permissions to access zoning codes for this jurisdiction.
usage: Provide jurisdiction_name and optionally specify zoning_district to retrieve relevant zoning regulations. Use this before analyzing property compliance.

zoning_districts.description: List of zoning district codes covered

allowed_uses.description: Permitted land uses for the district(s)

restrictions.description: List of zoning restrictions and limitations

last_updated.description: Date when zoning codes were last updated
